sectionTitle: Meet the Top Dentists in Kalamboli & Navi Mumbai
sectionSubtitle: At ClinSmile Dental Clinic, we believe every smile deserves to shine! Our expert dentists in Navi Mumbai provide complete preventive, restorative, and cosmetic care - from dental implants in Kalamboli and cosmetic dentistry to trusted family dentistry - all under one roof with comfort and care you can trust.

doctors.name: Dr. Akash Mankare
doctors.title: Founder & Chief Dentist
bio: Dr. Akash Mankare is a highly skilled dental professional with a Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS) degree from Government Dental College, Mumbai â€” one of India's premier dental institutions.

She has over 8 years of clinical experience in dentistry, including 3 years of service as a government dentist at GDC Mumbai, where she gained extensive expertise in treating a wide range of dental conditions.

Dr. Rizwana specializes in cosmetic dentistry, Invisalign treatment, and comprehensive family care. Known for her gentle approach, clear communication, and attention to detail, she ensures that every patient feels comfortable and confident throughout their treatment journey.

doctors.name: Dr. Ahmed Ameen, BDS
doctors.title: Orthodontist & Implant Specialist
bio: Dr. Ahmed Ameen is a specialized orthodontist with advanced training in dental implants and orthodontic treatments.
With 10+ years of experience in orthodontics, he specializes in braces, Invisalign, and dental implant procedures.
Dr. Ameen is known for his precision in complex cases and his ability to create beautiful, functional smiles for patients of all ages.

doctors.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson, MDS
doctors.title: Pediatric Dentist
bio: Dr. Sarah Johnson is a dedicated pediatric dentist with a passion for making dental care enjoyable for children.
She has 12 years of experience in pediatric dentistry and specializes in child-friendly treatments, preventive care, and early orthodontic intervention.
Dr. Johnson creates a warm, welcoming environment that helps children develop positive attitudes toward dental health from an early age.

doctors.name: Dr. Michael Chen, BDS
doctors.title: Endodontist & Root Canal Specialist
bio: Dr. Michael Chen is an experienced endodontist specializing in root canal treatments and endodontic procedures.
With 9 years of expertise in endodontics, he provides painless root canal treatments, endodontic surgery, and emergency dental care.
Dr. Chen uses advanced technology and techniques to ensure comfortable, successful treatments for complex dental cases.
